text: Hi Alex! Thank you so much for agreeing to be my mentor, it means a lot to me! I am a recent graduate from the University of Hertfordshire (MA Animation), and I had my BA studies back at home (Minsk, Belarus) at the Academy of Arts.  At the moment I'm trying to find my way in the industry and I would greatly appreciate if you could give me some advice on that! Thanks again:)

Hi Alina, 
It’s a pleasure to be your E-mentor. Reading all this I am thinking... we should probably speak Russian, but it’s up to you.

I work at MPC London as a compositing artist.  I have been working here for 4,5 years. Before I worked in Moscow as a 3D generalist in different VFX post-productions. I was born in raised in Bryansk which is pretty close to Minsk :)
Let me know if available for a chat this weekend. Ideally, Saturday morning, but we can arrange it later. Speak to you soon.

Отлично! Тогда конечно по-русски, хотя иногда я даже не уверена как перевести некоторые термины с английского, так что если вы не против, иногда будет немного того и другого :slightly_smiling_face: MPC одна из самых топовых компаний в VFX, так что это очень здорово и ваш опыт бы мне очень помог! Давайте тогда договоримся на субботу утром. Хорошего вам вечера!
